title: Learning Management System Accessibility Tool
description: Developed for a client, this tool enhances accessibility in LMS environments by allowing professors to upload and analyze course materials for accessibility issues. It provides detailed, step-by-step guidance for making content more accessible, fostering an inclusive learning experience. Built with React and Firebase for intuitive usability and secure data management.

title: Attendance Management System (EAMS)
description: Developed an Android application that streamlines event registration and attendance tracking for universities. The app supports multiple user roles (Attendee, Organizer, Administrator), enabling event creation, registration approvals, and real-time tracking. Integrated Firebase for user management and event data persistence, ensuring a smooth and secure experience for attendees and administrators.

title: Clothing Landing Page
description: A modern, responsive web application built with React.js and Vite, designed to showcase a fictional clothing brand. This project demonstrates a visually appealing landing page with interactive elements and a clean design. It was created as part of an application for a Shopify intern position, highlighting proficiency in front-end development and UI/UX design.

title: Trivia Quest
description: Trivia Quest is a web-based trivia game project utilizing an API to fetch questions from diverse categories. Test your knowledge across diverse categories in this interactive game designed for desktop and mobile browsers.

title: Business Management System
description: Developed a Business Management System in Java, integrating object-oriented principles for efficient customer management and JSON-based data persistence.

title: Pokemon Search App
description: Developed a dynamic web application utilizing the Pokémon API to retrieve and showcase comprehensive Pokémon details such as ID, images, types, and descriptive information.
